chapters.title: Chapter 31: Assurances
chapters.info: Alanna Mosvani, p. 492 (443)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She has long, black hair, dark eyes, and is dark and slender. She has several Warders, including Ihvon and (until recently) Owein. She thinks that Mat, Perrin, and Rand should be bonded as Warders to “keep an eye on them,” but says, “I am not so lost to custom yet as to bond a man against his will. Not quite yet.” She is shameless around men. See also Ihvon; Owein.
